string-array.name: funFacts
string-array.item: One of aloe’s most famous uses is to soothe sunburnt skin, and it can be also used for cold sores.
There are 12-15 species of ivy.
Spider plants also go by the names “airplane plant,” “ribbon plant,” and “spider ivy.”
Snake plants are effective at cleaning the air, removing toxins such as formaldehyde.
On some varieties of Calathea it looks like there are eyes on the leaves, just like peacock feathers. That is why Calathea is also referred to as the Peacock Plant.
Over 2500 species of palm trees exist today.
Place a coin in the soil with your Chinese money plant, and it’ll spontaneously start to attract wealth.
The name of the plant originated from Latin “Ficus” that stands for “fig.”
Calamondin oranges are a dwarf citrus variety.
Tortoises like to eat leaves of the jade plant.
The plant is also known as Elephant\'s Ear.
Guzmania dies after it has produced its flowers in summer but new plants can easily be propagated from the offsets which appear as the parent plant dies.
